All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
Contains most of the logic for creating and drawing the board and its pieces
Game
Contains the actual game that is being played
Lobby
Lets the users change game settings
Main
Main Class
Menu
Creates the main menu and is the first class to load when the user executes the .jar file Leads to the rules, enables the user to exit out of the program and leads to the Lobby, where the player can start the game
Move
Manages moves
Piece
Holds logic for generating piece moves and information about said pieces
PieceColor
Color of a piece, may be RED or BLUE
Player
One of two players
Rules
Has text that contains the rules of the game
